welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Riga, Latvia! Get ready to explore the beautiful Old Town, enjoy the city's rich history, and indulge in the vibrant culture. We hope you have a memorable time discovering all that Riga has to offer."

restaurants.name: Tej Restaurant
restaurants.description: Tej Restaurant is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Sītāmarhi.
restaurants.address: Near R.D. Palace (Mata Mandir Road), Sītāmarhi, Bihār

restaurants.name: Shere punjab Restaurant
restaurants.description: Shere punjab Restaurant is a indian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Laziz Restaurant & Banquet Hall
restaurants.description: Laziz Restaurant & Banquet Hall is a restaurant located in Chak Rajopatti, Sitamarhi.
restaurants.address: Dumra Road, NH77 (Opposite Ganesh Petrol Pump), Chak Rajopatti, Sitamarhi 843302, Bihār

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riga International Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riga International Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
